description:
Samsung Galaxy F12 Price in Bangladesh October 2024

The Samsung Galaxy F12 is now available in two variants (64/128/4/GB RAM). Now, Samsung Galaxy F12s’s Price is BDT 15,000 in Bangladesh. Galaxy F12 has a 6000mAh battery with 15W fast charging. This device is running with Android 11 and powered by the Exynos 850 (8nm) chipset.

Samsung Galaxy F12 highlight

Samsung Galaxy F12 will be launched in 2021, April. The Galaxy F12 launched with model number SM-F127G, SM-F127G/DS, SM-F127F, SM-F127F/DS. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 164 x 75.9 x 9.7 mm and the weight is 221 grams. Secondly, the display of Galaxy F12 is a 6.5-inch PLS IPS panel with 720 x 1600 pixels resolution. The display is protecting from the unknown. Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the Exynos 850 (8nm) and running with Android 11. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU.

Samsung Galaxy F12 phone has a quad-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 48MP wide, 5MP ultrawide, and 2MP macro, 2MP depth camera. It has an 8MP selfie camera inside the notch of the display. The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps. According to its RAM and ROM, It has two (4GB/64/128GB) variants. On the other hand, it can support up to microSDXC on uses a dedicated slot. Certainly, Galaxy F12 has a 6000mAh battery with 15-watt fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, Galaxy F12 is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is side-mounted.

On the other hand, among the other features, there is WLAN, Bluetooth, FM Radio, and USB port.

Your question and our opinion about Samsung Galaxy F12

Which question you will have about this phone. Let’s justify these. There we are including the major question and answers about this phone. So, let’s start now.

When it will released?

It will launch on 2021, April.

What is the price of Samsung Galaxy F12?

The price of Samsung Galaxy F12 is BDT 15,000.

How much RAM and ROM does it contain?

It has one variant of 4GB in RAM & three variants of 64/128GB in ROM. But, overall you can get four variants (64GB/4GB, 128GB/4GB) in market

Which type of display panel used in it?

It comes with a 6.5″ PLS IPS Display panel with 720 x 1600 pixels resolution.

How is the processor and chipset?

It contains a Exynos 850 (8nm).

What is the camera and video capabilities?

The quad-camera setup on the back 48MP+5MP+2MP+2MP and an 8MP selfie camera. The video recording capability is 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fps.

Dose it is support 5G network?

No, It is support 4G network with 2G and 3G.

How the battery capacity is?

The battery capacity is 6000mAh Li-Polymer battery with 15W fast charging.

What sensors does this phone have?

Fingerprint, accelerometer, proximity, and compass .

Which country and company manufactured it?

Samsung manufactured it and this phone is made in Korea.

Reason to Buy

In this paragraph, we are going to describe the important major to buy this. Why a person may buy this smartphone? Firstly, when anyone wants to buy a device they find out the premium things on the device according to their price. So, let us find out some eligible things which are in Samsung Galaxy F12.

Our Verdict

In conclusion, we are giving our verdict on this device. If you want to buy the best 4G smartphone under 20K Taka. Then Samsung Galaxy F12 will in the first row among the best smartphones. Dear friends if you have an attraction to online games like Free Fire, PUBG Mobile, and so on then you can buy it. Because it has RAM and a well Processor using the Exynos 850 (8nm) chipset. If you want a big backup on charge then you can buy this. Because it has a huge 6000mAh battery. In addition, it’s a 4G supportable smartphone. So, you can get good network facilities on it. However, it has a quad-cam setup with a 48MP primary camera. So, it’s the image and video capability may be well. Therefore, to judge all of these reasons you can buy this.
